Address.value: C/O MOBILEYE B.V.,P.O. BOX 45157, HAR HOTZVIM, 13 HARTOM STREET, JERUSALEM, 9777513, Israel

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Mobileye Global Inc engages in the development and deployment of ADAS and autonomous driving technologies and solutions. It is building a portfolio of end-to-end ADAS and autonomous driving solutions to provide the capabilities needed for the future of autonomous driving, leveraging a comprehensive suite of purpose-built software and hardware technologies. Its solutions comprise of Driver Assist, Cloud-Enhanced Driver Assist, Mobileye SuperVision Lite, Mobileye SuperVision, Mobileye Chauffeur, Mobileye Drive, Self-Driving System & Vehicles. It also provides data services to Expedite Maintenance Operations with AI-Powered Road Survey Technology.
